description: Try our easy to follow Cauliflower, Kale & Bacon Mac Cheese recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cauliflower, Kale & Bacon Mac Cheese Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Crumble bread into coarse breadcrumbs. Add bacon and remaining cheese. Sprinkle over pasta mixture. Spray with oil. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden brown and bubbling around the edges.
